extendedInfo.description: "Jewels Maze 2" is a very classic jewels-matching fun style game with many new exciting features. Once you start, you can't stop!âââââ How to play âââââ - CLASSIC JEWELS-MATCHING FUNSwap jewels to match 3+ same jewels, more the better;- DIG INTO GEM MINEBlast jewels near ground to collect gold, silver and buried artifacts before the time runs out;- RACE AGAINST ROCK PILLARSTest your jewels-swapping ability in a race against time.âââââ Highlighted Features âââââ  - Five game modes, each has its own attractive point, to keep the players' feeling of freshness;- Well-designed maps, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive;- New power ups, to make the game more exciting and interesting;- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects; We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For "Jewels Maze 2", we want to make it the best jewels-matching fun style game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated.Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see the whole gamelist.Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support.==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Dash, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: Blazing fast
reviews.comment: When you get started on this and the faster you get it is blazing fast, yet fun to play just to see how long you can keep up with it. Good for hand and eye cord nation.  Real fun and cool game.
reviews.author: Ron Larson

reviews.title: Visually pleasing quick and fun
reviews.comment: Pleasant   Entertainmento
reviews.author: laqueta Vaughn

reviews.title: Teresa
reviews.comment: Fast and exciting.  Don\'t like the fact that time runs out and they expect you to buy time or end the game. So much for free.
reviews.author: Teresa Lightsey

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Something easy.  Enjoyable and easy to play.
reviews.author: Mimi Stahl

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Just awful....serious lagging problems. Other than that nice variety of levels and stages.
reviews.author: Sofonda Hire

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my HTC EVO. Lots of levels, no freezes or drops. Does eat up battery, but that\'s because it\'s so addictive!  :-D
reviews.author: HopeflRomantc

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: I just started playing this game but so far so good. Thumbs up!!!!!
reviews.author: libra P

reviews.title: Great Time Waster
reviews.comment: I have had this on my phone for over a year now and I really enjoy it. It is great when you are waiting for take out or in a waiting room. It has frozen on me a few times but not enough to make me get rid of it. It\'s worth the download.
reviews.author: Roxann Price

reviews.title: Like the option...
reviews.comment: My favorite is digger game lots of fun.
reviews.author: Michelle C.

reviews.title: Mostly good
reviews.comment: Overall this is a great game. The two worst things are that the time continues to run out even when you can\'t do anything, and you can never tell when you will be able to add time. I wish this game gave you a time bonus for finishing the level, or getting so many points at a time, or some way to get more time besides random bonus jewels. Also, I wish that the games with the option of \"quit\" instead of \"save and quit\" had one more step before actually quitting. I keep bumping the quit button&that\'s annoying.
reviews.author: Karew Stokes

reviews.title: It would be perfect if...
reviews.comment: It would be perfect if it had an option to allow a restart of a failed level, instead of having to restart at the very beginning of the game. That way, you could try to succeed & finish. Other than that, love it!!
reviews.author: Crickett Heath

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Not a bad game but not as goof as it could be.
reviews.author: Ernestine Perkins

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: A great way to kill time while standing/sitting somewhere when you just need to\"get away\" from reality for a few minutes, our hours ESP. while waiting for your next assignment O J R.E.M.
reviews.author: Jeffry Stout

reviews.title: A game that explodes with excitment!
reviews.comment: This game is great. I like Bejeweled a lot, but this game deserves the same glory as Bejeweled gets all over the world. This game could even match Bejeweled greatness. Reason is because this game has more game modes to it. But the graphics dont top Bejeweled\'s.
reviews.author: Kyle Rohacs

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: My husband got me addicted to this game and I absolutely love it. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to play a bunch of games.
reviews.author: lesli beatty

reviews.title: Very Entertaining
reviews.comment: I found the game to be fast paced, fun and challenging. Time goes quickly so act fast.   Definately a good download!
reviews.author: Tami C

reviews.title: Dissappointed
reviews.comment: I agree with another lady who says it is a fun and fast game. But when you run out of time. Then you want paid for 30 seconds. Shame i like this game alot. But i am going to unstall it .i will give it 1star.
reviews.author: Vickie Toppings

reviews.title: It amazing game
reviews.comment: Its an amazing game it\'s so fun and me n my parent plays it and Take turn it\'s that fun and we never lie playing games but this game is wonderful
reviews.author: Kasana Baily

reviews.title: Good/its ok
reviews.comment: This game is good but no as good as it looks and not what i thourght it wud be it passes the time tho its just weird ive played better like jewel saga thats the  best sorry
reviews.author: Jade Parnell

reviews.title: The white stones is the game changer
reviews.comment: 30 seconds for 99cents what a ripoff ..I\'ve had close to a minute and a half, and once the white stones appear you can\'t play good enough to earn 30 seconds ..that\'s bull
reviews.author: Jason gallimore
